data.title: President Kennedy Greets Dr. Kwame Nkrumah, President of Ghana, on Arrival at Washington International Airport, Washington, D.C., 8 March 1961
data.meta_description: Silent motion picture containing scenes of President John F. Kennedy greeting Dr. Kwame Nkrumah, President of Ghana, on his arrival at Washington International Airport, Washington, D.C. Secretary of State Dean Rusk also attends. Dr. Kwame and President Kennedy speak at microphones and leave together by car. Materials in this series were created, commissioned, or collected by the United States Air Force.
data.meta_site_name: John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum
data.text:

About Moving Image

Title

President Kennedy Greets Dr. Kwame Nkrumah, President of Ghana, on Arrival at Washington International Airport, Washington, D.C., 8 March 1961

Digital Identifier

USG-03-N

Description

Silent motion picture containing scenes of President John F. Kennedy greeting Dr. Kwame Nkrumah, President of Ghana, on his arrival at Washington International Airport, Washington, D.C. Secretary of State Dean Rusk also attends. Dr. Kwame and President Kennedy speak at microphones and leave together by car. Materials in this series were created, commissioned, or collected by the United States Air Force.

Copyright Status

Public Domain

Media Type

Extent / Physical Description

1 film reel (black-and-white; silent; 35 mm; 958 feet; 21 minutes)

Series

Series 03. United States Air Force.

Preferred Citation

United States Government Agencies Collection. President Kennedy Greets Dr. Kwame Nkrumah, President of Ghana, on Arrival at Washington International Airport, Washington, D.C., 8 March 1961

Subject(s)

Place(s)

Contributor(s)

United States. Air Force

Archival Creator(s)

National Archives and Records Administration. Office of Presidential Libraries. John F. Kennedy Library. (04/01/1985- )
